SummaryEnglish: Hokaze Kon is an otherwise normal boy who, one day, receives an inter-dimensional summons to the world of Mirror. He appears just in time to save the life of Princess Ecarlate, whose enemies are trying to prevent her political marriage. Kon, who knows nothing about Mirror nor the way home, attaches himself to Ecarlate's entourage.

1.SummaryEnglish: Kon was getting nowhere in the game until a character by the name of Flora asked for his help in the “real world”.

2.SummaryEnglish: After his defeat to Kon, Erec has been left lopsided. Meanwhile, Kon wants to find a way home but the Princess has other plans.

3.SummaryEnglish: While Erec deals with the loss of another family jewel. Kon is in a battle against a furry little creature.

4.SummaryEnglish: Erec has returned home to recover, a plot against honor and family is hatched against him.

5.SummaryEnglish: Marian is trans, something Kon keeps forgetting. When he ask about Marian's back story, the story he is given is…expected.

6.SummaryEnglish: The group has never been in more danger than now. The princess has entered her hyperactivity period and no person, city, or country is safe if she reaches her danger zone.

7.SummaryEnglish: What should have been a relaxing trip to the hot springs and complicated by Kon’s glowing inability to control his self and that Erec is staying at the same inn.

9.SummaryEnglish: Erecpyle travels with the mysterious beauty Alma Flora to retrieve a new weapon; meanwhile the announcement of his return has caused his subordinates to fight for the honor of Erec’s right hand man.

10.SummaryEnglish: Kon has seemed to have lost his mind and reverted back to his days as an anti-social gamer nerd. The princess has ordered Marion and Sainglain to bring him back to his senses.

11.SummaryEnglish: A surprise attack by Erec and his men with their new super weapons leave Kon and crew running for their lives. In the aftermath, each group is left with a prisoner of war to “interrogate”.

12.SummaryEnglish: Gustave has taken it upon himself to observe Marion and Sanglain following the death of the Princess and DT. But KT thinks Gustave is in the city of Marquesas for other reasons.

13.SummaryEnglish: After Kon and Ecarlate faked their death, the group finally can travel without worry. However, a crazy, misunderstanding young girl changes all that.

14.SummaryEnglish: While the group debates the best way to continue on to the capital, Kon discovers something interesting about their furry little friend.

15.SummaryEnglish: Kon just wants to make it to the library but will uncover the capitals many hidden societies, whether he likes it or not.

16.SummaryEnglish: Incognito has been ordered on stand by and therefore unable to track the still alive Kon. But that won’t stop one member from sneaking aboard the Lords airship and putting a bullet into his enemies.

17.SummaryEnglish: Kon answers on how to get home are at the research center, but when he makes it the lab chief will not give up any answers without payment.

18.SummaryEnglish: Kon performs wedding rituals on behalf of the princess, becoming increasingly more frustrated with each new one.

19.SummaryEnglish: The cowlick is back and the Princess wants to sing. Sing Kon! Sing Mari! Sing Sainglain! The world depends on it!

20.SummaryEnglish: Ecarlate and Jugglaburk will spend their first night together and Ecarlate is prepared to fulfill her duties. Kon is beside himself and can’t handle the atmosphere.

21.SummaryEnglish: The Mysterious woman has brought Ecarlate and her group along with Erec and his team to tell them the reason behind everything.

22.SummaryEnglish: The beginning of the group, Incognito, is a unique tale that requires sharing.

23.SummaryEnglish: The easy part was becoming a Hyperion; the hard part is dealing with family.

24.SummaryEnglish: It’s an all-out war between the Empire, Jugglaburk, and the hidden hand of the Ulga.

25.SummaryEnglish: Archbishop Taulepton and Ulga Sorority unleash their final weapon: the ultra giant Forezo. Kon must defeat it at all cost.
